oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dance with Chick Chavis at the Sunset Inn
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dances; Chavis, Jordan D., 1910-1992; African Americans--Performances & portrayals
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (blue on yellow) announcing a dance with Chick Chavis and the Masters of Rhythm at the Sunset Inn on June 11. Poster features a metal photoplate of Chick Chavis.
